briefdescription.para: Allows to make output RTF documents smaller in size, but if they contain RTL (right-to-left) text, it will not be displayed correctly. Default value is false.

detaileddescription.para: If the document that you want to convert to RTF using Aspose.Words does not contain right-to-left text in languages like Arabic, then you can set this option to true to reduce the size of the resulting RTF.

briefdescription.para: Specifies whether the keywords for "old readers" are written to RTF or not. This can significantly affect the size of the RTF document. Default value is true.

detaileddescription.para: "Old readers" are pre-Microsoft Word 97 applications and also WordPad. When this option is true Aspose.Words writes additional RTF keywords. These keywords allow the document to be displayed correctly when opened in an "old reader" application, but can significantly increase the size of the document.
If you set this option to false, then only images in WMF, EMF and BMP formats will be displayed in "old readers".

briefdescription.para: Specifies the format in which the document will be saved if this save options object is used. Can only be Rtf.
When true all images will be saved as WMF.
Can be used to specify additional options when saving a document into the Rtf format.
